document.title: Upper Teeth Alignment with Clear Aligners
document.summary: Your treatment plan involves using clear aligners to address the alignment of your upper teeth. This is expected to be a straightforward process, taking approximately 4–6 months to complete. The progress of your treatment will be primarily monitored remotely, providing convenience and reducing the need for frequent office visits. This approach is designed to be smooth and manageable, with our support available throughout your journey.
key_points: Clear aligners for upper teeth alignment
next_steps: Begin treatment with the first set of aligners
Regularly check progress through remote updates
Reach out for support whenever needed
care_instructions: Contact us with any questions or concerns
